title: Piz Bles
text: Piz Bles is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the <a href="Oberhalbstein%20Alps">Oberhalbstein Alps</a>, located on the border between <a href="Italy">Italy</a> (Lombardy) and <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a> (Graubünden). On its northwestern side lies the lake <a href="Lago%20di%20Lei">Lago di Lei</a>.
